short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Bubble Trouble Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Bubble Trouble Original като разширение за Chrome - Може също да се играе без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Reproduïu Bubble Trouble Original com a extensió de Chrome - També podeu jugar sense Internet, proveu-ho ara mateix!
short.cs: Hrajte Bubble Trouble Original jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete ho také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to nyní!
short.da: Spil Bubble Trouble Original som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spilles uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de,uk: Spielen Sie Bubble Trouble Original als Chrome-Erweiterung - Sie können es auch ohne Internet spielen, probieren Sie es jetzt aus!
short.el: Juega Bubble Trouble Original como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega Bubble Trouble Original como una extensión de Chrome. Además, se puede jugar sin conexión a internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Jouez à Bubble Trouble Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans internet, essayez maintenant !
short.fi: Pelaa Bubble Trouble alkuperäistä Chrome-lisäosana - Voit myös pelata ilman internet-yhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Bubble Trouble Original bilang isang extension ng Chrome - Maaari rin itong i-play nang walang koneksyon sa internet,…
short.fr: Jouez à Bubble Trouble Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he,it: Juega Bubble Trouble Original como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Speel Bubble Trouble Original as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.hr: Igrajte Bubble Trouble Original kao Chrome ekstenziju - Također može se igrati bez interneta, isprobajte odmah!
short.hu: Játssz a Bubble Trouble Original játékkal Chrome kiterjesztésként - Próbáld ki internet nélkül is!
short.id: Mainkan Bubble Trouble Original sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga bisa dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてBubble Trouble Originalをプレイできます - インターネットなしでもプレイ可能です、ぜひお試しください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 버블 트러블 오리지널을 플레이하세요 - 또한 인터넷 연결 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 확인해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite "Bubble Trouble Original" kaip "Chrome" išplėtimo programą - Galima žaisti ir be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet "Bubble Trouble Original" kā "Chrome" paplašinājumu. Tāpat to var spēlēt arī bez interneta. Pamēģiniet tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Bubble Trouble Original sebagai sambungan Chrome - Juga boleh dimainkan tanpa internet, cubalah sekarang!
short.nl: Jouez à Bubble Trouble Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant !
short.no: Juega Bubble Trouble Original como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Odtwórz Bubble Trouble Original jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Można także grać bez połączenia internetowego, spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Bubble Trouble Original ca o extensie Chrome - Poți juca fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Bubble Trouble Original в виде расширения для Chrome - Также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Play Bubble Trouble Original as a Chrome extension - Also, you can play without internet, try it now!
short.sl: Play Bubble Trouble Original as a Chrome extension - Also can play without Internet, try it now!
short.sr: Играјте Bubble Trouble Original као Хром проширење - Можете је играти без интернета, пробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Bubble Trouble Original som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่นเกม Bubble Trouble Original เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตด้วย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Şimdi Bubble Trouble Original'i Chrome uzantısı olarak oyna - Ayrıca İnternetsiz de oynayabilirsin, hemen dene!
short.vi: Chơi Bubble Trouble phiên bản gốc như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần kết nối internet, thử ngay nào!
short.zh_CN: 作为一个Chrome扩展程序播放Bubble Trouble原版-也可以无需互联网播放，立即试试！
short.zh_TW: 以 Google Chrome 擴充功能的形式玩「Bubble Trouble Original」- 也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩耍，現在就試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ubble Challenge is a timeless arcade adventure that introduces a fresh spin to the realm of bubble-bursting excitement. 🌟 Crafted by the ingenious mind of Kresimir Cvitanovic, this game invites players to navigate through levels teeming with lively bubbles armed with a trusty harpoon. The objective? Pop those bubbles into tinier fragments without falling into their trap! 💥

Bubble Challenge Unleashed 🚀
Player Commands

Directional Arrows: Steer your character left or right. ↔️
Spacebar: Unleash the harpoon to split bubbles into smaller fragments. 🔗
P: Take a breather and pause the game. ⏸️
How to Engage 🎮

Explore the Stages: Traverse through diverse levels packed with lively bouncing bubbles. 🌈
Pop Bubbles: Fire your harpoon strategically to burst bubbles into smaller bits. 💣
Evade Contact: Skillfully maneuver to avoid direct contact with the bubbles and prevent life loss. 🤺
Progress Through Levels: Move up the ranks by successfully clearing the screen of bubbles. 📈
Master the Art of Splitting: Understand the patterns of bubble splitting to tactically clear the screen. 🧠
Pointers and Strategies 🚀

Timing is Crucial: Hone your timing skills for harpoon shots to efficiently split bubbles. ⏰
Strategize Your Moves: Predict the trajectory of bubbles to evade getting trapped in tight spots. 🔄
Utilize Walls to Your Advantage: Rebound harpoon shots off walls to reach bubbles in challenging locations. 🧱
Keep an Eye out for Power-ups: Certain levels may hide power-ups or special items to enhance your bubble-popping escapade. ✨
Maintain Agility: Constantly move around to elude being cornered by the lively bouncing bubbles. 🕹️
Feel free to use "Bubble Trouble Original" as the renamed title for this thrilling arcade challenge! 🎉

Additional gaming options can be found in the top-left corner.
